segments.text: Elaine ’ s back from school . I think it might be a nice gesture if you asked her out . I suppose she ’ s not good enough for you , is that it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , Elaine Robinson and I do not get along .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you know ? You haven ’ t seen her since high school . I guess your evenings , whatever you do with them , are just too valuable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That has nothing to do with it ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I ’ ll just have to tell Mr . Robinson that you ’ re too busy every evening – doing God knows what ... God don ’ t go on like this . If you absolutely refuse to take her out ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I will simply have to invite all the Robinson ’ s over for dinner on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S1
